short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple calculator which you can access with your keyboard too! Available with 3 modes -> Default|Light|Dark

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Basic Calculator to do basic calculations. Instead of opening calculator app just tap and right away do you calculations. Available in 3 modes-> Default, Light and Dark.
